briefdescription.para: Configure resolution in video streaming mode.

parameterdescription.para: Chip select signal for SPI communication

briefdescription.para: Initialize the configuration of the camera module.
Start a snapshot with specified resolution and pixel format.

parameterdescription.para: Output image pixel format,which supports JPEG, RGB, YUV

simplesect.para: The mode parameter must be the resolution wh

memberdef.argsstring: (ArducamCamera *camera, CAM_IMAGE_MODE mode, CAM_IMAGE_PIX_FMT pixel_format, uint8_t number)
memberdef.name: takeMultiPictures

briefdescription.para: Start multi capture with specified number of image.

parameterdescription.para: Output image pixel format,which supports JPEG, RGB, YUV

simplesect.para: The mode parameter must be the resolution which the current camera supported

briefdescription.para: Start preview with specified resolution mode.

simplesect.para: Before calling this function, you need to register the callback function.The default image pixel format is JPEG

parameterdescription.para: 1 Turn on automatic exposure 0 Turn off automatic exposure

simplesect.para: Before calling this function, you need to use the setAutoExposure() function to turn off the auto exposure function

parameterdescription.para: 1 turn on automatic gain 0 turn off automatic gain

simplesect.para: Before calling this function, you need to use the setAutoISOSensitive() function to turn off the auto gain function

parameterdescription.para: 1 turn on automatic white balance 0 turn off automatic white balance

briefdescription.para: Set the white balance mode Manually.

simplesect.para: Only 5MP cameras support auto focus control

briefdescription.para: Read image data with specified length to buffer.

parameterdescription.para: The length of the available data to be read

simplesect.para: Transmission length should be less than 255
Before calling this function, make sure that the data is available in the buffer

parameterdescription.para: There are four bytes of buff Byte 1 indicates the device address, Byte 2 indicates the high octet of the register, Byte 3 indicates the low octet of the register, and Byte 4 indicates the value written to the register
The length of the data transmitted by the callback function at one time

simplesect.para: Transmission length should be less than 255
